txt.en: 'Dindal sent you, did he? Then I will count you as friend. Now, what have you sought me for, [placeholder]?'

Luntil, the boatwoman, can be found in a marshy inlet south along the shores of the Anduin in Lossarnach.\n\nYou should find Luntil and greet her in Dindal's name. She will take you across the river to find Lord Faramir's Rangers.

'You have done great good here, [placeholder]. If you wish to do more against our common foe, you must help in the greater fight. These Orcs came from across the Anduin, where the enemy mass in great number. I have seen it with my own eyes, up here.\n\n'Well to the south, in Lossarnach, in a marshy inlet, you will find a woman named Luntil. Greet her in my name, and she will take you across the river. There, with luck, you will find Lord Faramir's Rangers, who fight our enemy even now. Help them and you help us all.'
Well satisfied with your heroic work in Lossarnach, Dindal has bade you cross into South Ithilien and help the Rangers there.
